desktop. config

Contains configuraton for the desktop.

Summary
desktop. config
Contains configuraton for the desktop.
Functions
load
Loads the configuration from the server
save
Saves the current configuration to the server
apply
Applies the current configuration settings
Properties
fx
Intensity of desktop effects (3 = insane, 0 = none)
debug
Whether or not the desktop should output information involving debugging
crosstalkPing
Crosstalk ping interval (in miliseconds)
panels
an array of each panel’s settings and applets
wallpaper
wallpaper information
theme
The user’s preferred theme
theme
An array of app ids to launch at startup
window
window settings
filesystem
Some filesystem options (primarily for filearea)

Functions

load

load: function(cback)

Loads the configuration from the server

save

save: function(sync)

Saves the current configuration to the server

apply

apply: function()

Applies the current configuration settings

Properties

fx

Intensity of desktop effects (3 = insane, 0 = none)

debug

Whether or not the desktop should output information involving debugging

crosstalkPing

Crosstalk ping interval (in miliseconds)

panels

an array of each panel’s settings and applets

wallpaper

wallpaper information

imagethe image to display
colorthe background color of the wallpaper
stylecan be “centered”, “tiled”, or “fillscreen”
storedListan array of wallpapers that the user can pick from in the wallpaper dialog

theme

The user’s preferred theme

theme

An array of app ids to launch at startup

window

window settings

constrainshould the window be constrained to the screen’s edge?
animSpeedhow fast the fade/maximize/minimize animations should be in miliseconds

filesystem

Some filesystem options (primarily for filearea)

hideExtshould the file extentions be hidden?
iconsa json object containing icons for each file extention
